author: Julia Alexander
title: Netflix adds 15 million subscribers as people stream more than ever, but warns about tough road ahead
description: Netflix is the first major entertainment and media company to address investors’ questions as the COVID-19 pandemic shuts down production around the world. Netflix is one of the rare companies that can benefit from people being at home as streaming usage skyr…
content:
As time spent streaming increases, Netflix looks ahead
Ernesto S. Ruscio/Getty Images for Netflix
Netflix is one of the rare companies benefiting from the global pandemic, which has kept billions of people at home with nothing to do but stream, but the ques… [+6888 chars]
